thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's UCO Bank Dec Qtr Loss Widens

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's UCO Bank Dec Qtr Loss Widens

organizations.name: uco bank dec qtr loss widens feb

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - UCO Bank:
* DEC QUARTER NET LOSS 10.16 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS LOSS OF 4.37 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 34.50 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 41.92 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS AND CONTINGENCIES 13.85 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 13.26 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS FOR NPAS 16.82 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 9.14 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 20.64 PERCENT VERSUS 19.74 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 10.90 PERCENT VERSUS 9.98 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text - bit.ly/2H2Lu5w Further company coverage:
